title: Sentosa Island: Family Fun and Free Attractions
blurb: Discover fun things to do on the island for families.
description: Sentosa Island offers a wide array of attractions and activities perfect for families. From beautiful beaches and iconic sights to museums and nature experiences, there's something for everyone. Enjoy free attractions and create unforgettable memories with your loved ones. Explore the island's diverse offerings, including adventure activities, wildlife encounters, and captivating shows. Sentosa is a family-friendly destination with options for all ages and interests. Discover the magic of Sentosa and make lasting memories with your family.

title: Adventure Albatross Speedboat Adventures Sentosa
blurb: Albatross Speedboat Adventures From $ 45 .00
description: Experience the thrill of Albatross Speedboat Adventures at Resorts World Sentosa! Feel the wind in your hair as you speed across the water. This exciting activity is perfect for families and thrill-seekers alike. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Sentosa coastline and create unforgettable memories. Suitable for all ages, this adventure promises fun and excitement for everyone. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping experience that will leave you wanting more. Book your adventure today and make your visit to Sentosa truly unforgettable. This is a family-friendly activity.

blurb: Axe Factor offers thrilling axe-throwing experiences.
description: Experience the thrill of axe throwing at Adventure Axe Factor, located within Resorts World Sentosa. This attraction provides a unique and exciting activity for families and groups. Participants can test their skills and accuracy in a safe and controlled environment. With expert guidance and various game modes, Adventure Axe Factor promises an unforgettable experience for all skill levels. It's a great way to bond with family and friends while enjoying a fun and challenging activity. Suitable for older kids and adults.

title: Gunner Lane at Central Beach Bazaar, Sentosa
blurb: Located at Central Beach Bazaar, Sentosa Island.
description: Gunner Lane is located at Central Beach Bazaar. It offers a unique beachside experience with various attractions and activities suitable for families and visitors of all ages. Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere and explore the different offerings available at this location. It is a great place to spend time with family and friends, enjoying the sun, sand, and sea. The bazaar provides a variety of entertainment options, ensuring a memorable visit for everyone. With its central location and diverse attractions, Gunner Lane is a must-visit destination on Sentosa Island.

title: Adventure DinoVenture: A Virtual Reality Experience
blurb: A Virtual Reality Experience From $ 15 .00 Promo available
description: Experience a thrilling virtual reality adventure at Beach Station. Immerse yourself in a prehistoric world filled with dinosaurs and exciting challenges. This family-friendly attraction offers a unique and interactive experience for all ages. Explore the virtual landscape, encounter fascinating creatures, and embark on an unforgettable journey. Perfect for kids and adults alike, Adventure DinoVenture provides a fun and educational adventure that will leave you amazed. Discover the wonders of the past in a whole new way with this state-of-the-art VR experience. Get ready for an adventure!

title: Beach Station: Iconic Sights & Fort Siloso Points
blurb: Explore iconic sights and historical Fort Siloso points.
description: Discover the beauty of Beach Station, offering iconic sights and historical landmarks like Fort Siloso. Enjoy the scenic views and explore the rich history of this vibrant area. Perfect for families and history enthusiasts, Beach Station provides a memorable experience with its diverse attractions and stunning landscapes. Explore the free points and enjoy a day of adventure and discovery. This location offers a blend of natural beauty and historical significance, making it an ideal destination for all ages. Enjoy the sun, sand, and historical sites.

title: Fort Siloso Skywalk at Siloso Point, Sentosa Island
blurb: Iconic sights and historical landmarks await visitors.
description: Explore Singapore's only preserved coastal fort, a treasure trove of World War II memorabilia. Wander through the historical tunnels, gun emplacements, and interactive exhibits that bring the past to life. Ascend the Fort Siloso Skywalk for panoramic views of Sentosa and the surrounding sea. Discover the stories and sacrifices of those who defended Singapore during the war. A family-friendly destination that combines education with breathtaking scenery, offering a unique glimpse into Singapore's rich history and natural beauty. Perfect for history buffs and families alike.

description: Explore St John's Island with Gogreen Eco Adventure. Discover the island's natural beauty and enjoy various outdoor activities suitable for families and children. Experience the thrill of eco-friendly adventures while learning about the environment. This activity is perfect for those who love nature and outdoor exploration. Enjoy a day of fun and adventure with your family at St John's Island. Discover the hidden gems of the island and create lasting memories. Engage in exciting activities and learn about the importance of environmental conservation. This is a great opportunity to connect with nature and have a memorable experience.

title: Madame Tussauds Singapore Wax Attraction Venue
blurb: See wax figures of famous people and celebrities.
description: Madame Tussauds Singapore is a wax museum and tourist attraction on Sentosa Island in Singapore. It showcases wax figures of famous and historical personalities, as well as popular film and television characters. Visitors can take photos with the figures and learn about their lives and achievements. The museum also features interactive exhibits and experiences, such as a virtual reality ride and a behind-the-scenes look at the making of wax figures. It is a family-friendly attraction that offers a fun and educational experience for all ages.

title: Siloso Beach
blurb: Enjoy the sun, sand, and sea at Siloso Beach.
description: Siloso Beach is known for its lively atmosphere and various recreational activities. Visitors can enjoy swimming, sunbathing, beach volleyball, and water sports. The beach is lined with restaurants, bars, and shops, offering a variety of dining and entertainment options. It's a great place for families to spend a day out, with plenty of space for kids to play and build sandcastles. The calm waters are ideal for swimming, and there are lifeguards on duty to ensure safety. The beach also hosts various events and festivals throughout the year, adding to its vibrant atmosphere. Perfect for families looking for a fun day at the beach.

title: Ricochet Sentosa
blurb: Experience thrilling water sports at Ricochet Sentosa.
description: Ricochet Sentosa offers a range of exciting water sports activities for thrill-seekers and families alike. Located at Larkhill Road, it provides opportunities for jet skiing, parasailing, banana boat rides, and more. Whether you're an experienced water sports enthusiast or a beginner, there's something for everyone to enjoy. The experienced instructors ensure a safe and fun experience for all participants. Families can bond over exhilarating rides and create lasting memories. Enjoy the beautiful coastal scenery while engaging in adrenaline-pumping activities at Ricochet Sentosa.

title: Beauty and Wellness Scentopia Larkhill Road
blurb: Beauty and Wellness Scentopia From $ 75 .00 Promo
description: Scentopia is a unique attraction that blends the world of perfumery with the beauty and wellness industry. Visitors can explore interactive exhibits, create their own custom scents, and learn about the history and science of fragrance. The attraction offers a family-friendly environment where both adults and children can engage in sensory experiences and discover the power of scent. Activities include perfume-making workshops, scent-matching games, and educational tours. Scentopia aims to provide an immersive and memorable experience for all ages, promoting creativity and well-being through the art of perfumery.

blurb: Iconic Sights Sentosa Sensoryscape Free Imbiah Lookout

It's a place where families can enjoy iconic sights and sensory experiences. The area is designed to stimulate the senses and provide a memorable visit for all ages. Explore the various zones and immerse yourself in the unique environment. Perfect for a family outing, Imbiah Lookout provides a blend of relaxation and discovery. title: Resorts World Sentosa Iconic Sights SkyHelix
blurb: Iconic Sights SkyHelix Sentosa From $ 17 .00 Promo
description: SkyHelix Sentosa is Singapore's highest open-air panoramic ride. This unique attraction offers breathtaking 360-degree views of Sentosa and the Southern Islands. Guests can enjoy a leisurely ride that gently rotates as it ascends to a height of 79 meters above sea level. The experience is perfect for families and individuals looking for a memorable and scenic adventure. Enjoy the stunning views and capture unforgettable moments from this iconic vantage point. A must-visit attraction for those seeking a unique perspective of Sentosa's beauty.

title: Imbiah Lookout Adventure Skyline Luge Singapore
blurb: Adventure Skyline Luge Singapore From $ 33 .00
description: Experience the thrill of Skyline Luge Singapore at Imbiah Lookout. Enjoy a unique wheeled gravity ride with steering and braking control. Perfect for families and thrill-seekers of all ages. Navigate the tracks with twists and turns for an unforgettable adventure. The Luge is a part go-kart, part toboggan, and totally unique. Control your speed as you ride down one of our four exciting Luge tracks. With specially designed Luge carts and helmets, it's safe and fun for all ages. Enjoy the scenic views from the Skyride as you ascend to the top.

blurb: Discover the beauty of the Southern Islands near Sentosa.
description: The Southern Islands offer a unique opportunity to explore Singapore's natural beauty. These islands are home to diverse ecosystems and pristine beaches. Visitors can enjoy hiking, birdwatching, and swimming in crystal-clear waters. Lazarus Island is one of the most popular destinations, known for its tranquil atmosphere and stunning views. Families can pack a picnic and spend the day exploring the island's hidden coves and sandy shores. The islands are accessible by ferry and offer a peaceful escape from the city. The area is perfect for nature lovers and those seeking a relaxing getaway. The islands provide a memorable experience for all ages.

title: Palawan Beach at Sentosa Island, Singapore
blurb: Enjoy the sun and sand at Palawan Beach, Sentosa.
description: Palawan Beach is a family-friendly beach located on Sentosa Island. It features soft white sand, calm waters, and a variety of activities for children and adults. The beach is home to the Southernmost Point of Continental Asia, a small islet connected to the mainland by a suspension bridge. Visitors can climb the towers for panoramic views of the surrounding area. There are also several food and beverage outlets located near the beach, making it a great place to spend a day with the family. Activities include swimming, sunbathing, and playing in the sand. The beach is easily accessible by public transport and is a popular destination for both locals and tourists.
